title: Script font
content:
What’s the name of the script font used in the words “lets” and “lost”?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3234639841\_9f22bb583e.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105956/http:/typophile.com/files/3234639841_9f22bb583e.jpg) | 168.98 KB |
author: miniman

comments.content: We had that here before: Athletic Script, Aktuelle or Spoleto.
It is a pity, that the older threads haven’t got those descriptive titles. This has changed in the last days. Thanks to Yves …?

You can search the site for references to these. In spite of the fact that we see questions about it a lot, I think finding the font anywhere has been difficult. The site that had Aktuelle wouldn’t allow selecting it, and Spoleto seems MIA online (I have it in my collection), and Opti Sport Script is another alias (from the impenetrable CastCraft folks).

- Mike Yanega
